page.t: This tag is used to put bookmarks links and branches into the PDF document. This may be useful to write an index for the content of all the pages.
- A node number to follow the tree (default="0")
- A string representing the information. (must be defined by user)
This tag allows user to change default values.
- Font name to use: (could be: Helvetica-TimesRoman-Courier)
Draw an image. Set info for this document. Page section tag. Draw an horitzontal separator. Force the end of document. Allows to include another file. Resets to default settings. Text tag.
For more information please refer to the sources ( parse_*.c and defs.* files ).
